hexagon.extraInfo:
ChatGPT is a type of conversational AI powered by the GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) architecture, which is developed by OpenAI. It is designed to generate human-like text responses in a conversational context. ChatGPT can be used for a wide range of natural language processing tasks, including answering questions, providing explanations, engaging in text-based conversations, and more.
Link to service: https://chat.openai.com/

Microsoft's Bing AI chatbot is an integrated feature within the Bing search engine that utilizes the same technology found in ChatGPT. It enhances search results and performs various tasks by simulating human conversation, thanks to the underlying GPT technology. Unlike conventional search engines that primarily provide lists of links and brief page descriptions, Bing's AI chatbot can respond to your queries in a more human-like and detailed manner.
Link to service: https://www.bing.com/?/ai

Bard is Google's experimental, conversational, AI chat service. It is meant to function similarly to ChatGPT, with the biggest difference being that Google's service will pull its information from the web. Like most AI chatbots, Bard can code, answer math problems, and help with your writing needs.
Link to service: https://bard.google.com/

HuggingChat is a recently developed AI chatbot that enters the competitive landscape alongside established models like OpenAI's ChatGPT, Bing Chat, Bard, and others. Similar to its counterparts, HuggingChat is a generative AI tool proficient in generating text for various purposes, such as crafting summaries, essays, letters, emails, and song lyrics. It can also assist in debugging and coding, formulate Excel functions, and provide answers to general inquiries, mirroring the capabilities of ChatGPT and similar AI chatbots.
Link to service: https://huggingface.co/chat/

YouChat is an AI tool developed by You.com, akin to ChatGPT. It's constructed by integrating established Large Language Models (LLMs) with unique features designed by You.com. With YouChat, you have the option to perform web searches in the conventional manner, and you can also utilize it to obtain the information you're looking for.
Link to service: https://about.you.com/youchat/

LaMDA is a factual language model from Google AI, trained on a massive dataset of text and code. It can generate different creative text formats of text content, like poems, code, scripts, musical pieces, email, letters, etc. It will try its best to fulfill all your requirements.
Link to service: https://aitestkitchen.withgoogle.com/

Replika is a chatbot that is designed to be a companion. It can learn your personality and interests, and it can have conversations with you about a variety of topics. Replika can also help you to relax and de-stress, and it can even be a friend to confide in.
Link to service: https://replika.com/

Megatron-Turing NLG is a large language model chatbot developed by Google AI. It is trained on a massive dataset of text and code, and is able to generate human-quality text in response to a wide range of prompts and questions.
Link to service: https://turing.microsoft.com/

Blender is a large language model chatbot developed by Meta AI. It is trained on a massive dataset of text and code, and is able to generate human-quality text, translate languages, write different kinds of creative content, and answer questions in an informative way.
Link to service: https://blenderbot.ai/

Chatbot Landscape: Explore a diverse collection of diagrams showcasing a multitude of chatbots. These visual representations provide an overview of the ever-evolving chatbot ecosystem, highlighting different designs, use cases, and technologies employed in the world of conversational AI.

PaLM is a large language model chatbot developed by Google AI. It is trained on a massive dataset of text and code, and is able to generate human-quality text, translate languages, write different kinds of creative content, and answer questions in an informative way. PaLM is also able to perform advanced reasoning tasks, including code and math, classification and question answering, translation and multilingual proficiency, and natural language generation.
Link to service: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai

Jurassic-1 Jumbo is a large language model chatbot developed by AI21 Labs. It is trained on a massive dataset of text and code, and is able to generate human-quality text, translate languages, write different kinds of creative content, and answer questions in an informative way. Jurassic-1 Jumbo is also able to perform advanced reasoning tasks, and is one of the largest language models in the world.
Link to service: https://www.ai21.com/blog/announcing-ai21-studio-and-jurassic-1

Alexa is a virtual assistant developed by Amazon. It is available on a variety of devices, including Echo smart speakers, Fire TV devices, and smartphones. Alexa can be used to control smart home devices, get information such as the weather, news, and traffic, play music, and more.
Link to service: https://alexa.amazon.com/

Gopher is a large language model chatbot developed by DeepMind. It is trained on a massive dataset of text and code, and is able to generate human-quality text, translate languages, write different kinds of creative content, and answer questions in an informative way. Gopher is also able to perform advanced reasoning tasks, and is one of the largest language models in the world.
Link to service: https://www.deepmind.com/blog/language-modelling-at-scale-gopher-ethical-considerations-and-retrieval

Anima is a chatbot that is designed to help you to learn about yourself. It asks you questions about your thoughts, feelings, and experiences, and it uses its knowledge of psychology to provide you with insights. Anima can also help you to set goals and develop strategies for achieving them.
Link to service: https://myanima.ai/

Google AI Meena is a conversational AI chatbot that can have open-ended conversations with people. It is trained on a massive dataset of text and code, and it can learn and adapt to the conversations it has. Meena can be used for a variety of purposes, such as customer service, education, and entertainment.
Link to service: https://blog.research.google/2020/01/towards-conversational-agent-that-can.html

With the rapid advancement of AI technology, a valid concern arises regarding the accuracy and safety of chatbots that may provide unreliable information and promote risky behaviour. Sparrow has been developed as a dialogue agent dedicated to mitigating the risks associated with inappropriate or unsafe responses commonly observed in Large Language Models (LLMs). Its primary objective is to strike a delicate balance between being informative and helpful while minimising the potential for undesirable outcomes.
Link to service: https://www.deepmind.com/blog/building-safer-dialogue-agents

SimSimi is an artificial intelligence conversation program created in 2002 by ISMaker. It grows its artificial intelligence day by day assisted by a feature that allows users to teach it to respond correctly. SimSimi, pronounced as "shim-shimi", is from a Korean word simsim which means "bored"
Link to service: https://simsimi.com/

Bixby is a virtual assistant developed by Samsung. It is available on Samsung smartphones and TVs. Bixby can be used to control smart home devices, get information from the web, and set alarms and reminders.
Link to service: https://www.samsung.com/us/apps/bixby/

A new AI tool that could help doctors assess the early signs of dementia and Alzheimer's more quickly and efficiently, has been developed by researchers at the University of Sheffield. The system, known as CognoSpeak, uses a virtual agent displayed on a screen to engage a patient in a conversation. It asks memory-probing questions inspired by those used in outpatient consultations and conducts cognitive tests, such as picture descriptions and verbal fluency tests.
Link to service: https://cognospeak.co.uk/cognospeak-login

Facial Assessment Tool is a facial analysis tool that uses Artificial Intelligence (AI) to analyze facial features and create a comprehensive report of a person’s facial characteristics. This report is then used to assess a person’s overall facial attractiveness and to provide detailed feedback on which features should be improved and which features are best suited for a particular face. The facial assessment tool can be used by individuals to gain insights into their facial characteristics and to understand how to improve their overall appearance. It can also be used by professionals in the beauty industry, such as makeup artists, to gain insights into the facial features of their clients and to provide them with personalized advice on the best makeup and beauty products for their particular face. Link to service: https://topai.tools/t/facial-assessment-tool

GlowAI is a website that helps you create your own skincare routine in seconds. You can also see the ratings, reviews, and ingredients of each product before you buy them.
Link to service: https://glow-ai.vercel.app/
